definition: Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
to combine traditional Chinese and Western medicine

sentences.english: To explore traditional chinese and western medicine treatment methods anorectal prolapse.
sentences.chinese: 探討中西醫治療肛管直腸脫垂的方法。

sentences.english: However, it also encountered several problems on the way of development.
sentences.chinese: 但中西醫結合在發展的道路上也遇到了若干問題。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment perscription with the method of integrated traditional and western medicine in type 2 diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討2型糖尿病中西醫結合治療方案。

sentences.english: Resultantly , the gastric cancer postoperative complications were successfully treated with the combination of Chinese and Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中西醫結合治療成功控制此胃癌術後併發症的案例。

sentences.english: Surgery of integrated Chinese and Western medicine is a clinical discipline that attaches great importance to practice.
sentences.chinese: 中西醫結合外科學是一門實踐性極強的臨牀學科。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical efficacy of treating tubal reghancy with combined therapy of Chinese and western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中西醫結合治療輸卵管妊娠的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the effect of traditional Chinese medicine combined with western medicine on treatment muscular asthenopia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察用中西醫結合方法治療肌性視疲勞的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of Banxiaxiexin decoction combined with Mosapride tablets in treating functional dyspepsia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察中西醫結合治療功能性消化不良的療效。

sentences.english: We observed the effect of integrative medical treatment in therapy group and simply isosorbide dinitrate treatment in control group.
sentences.chinese: 對中西醫結合方法和單純服用消心痛的療效進行觀察。

sentences.english: To explore the clinical effect of Chinese medicine combined with western medicine in treating lymphoid tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中西醫治療淋巴結核的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To explore how to increase cure rate of hemorrhagic necrotizing pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 中西醫結合治療急性壞死性筋膜炎能取得良好的療效。

sentences.english: Conclusion There is a definite effect of combined Chinese and western medicine of primary nephrosis syndrom.
sentences.chinese: 結論中西醫結合治療原發性腎病綜合徵療效確切。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effects of two kinds of methods on erysipelas. Methods One hundred and four cases were arranged to two groups.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察中西醫結合方法治療丹毒的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Objective Treatment of Chinese and Western Medicine Chest to explore effective means of heartache.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索中西醫結合治療胸痹心痛的有效手段。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effectiveness of integrated Chinese and Westen medicine on bed pressure with that of conventional method.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較中西醫結合方法與傳統方法治療壓瘡的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Chinese and western medical film on operculitis of submaxilla wisdom tooth.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察中西醫藥膜治療下頜智齒冠周炎的效果。

definition: interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
to treat the symptoms/reactive (rather than proactive)
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed
